data.title: Come for the drinks but don't stay for the food
data.text: Hacienda has a great bar.   But you will need it for the food- which is sort of Comida Pepsicana Mexican.  If you want great Mexican food, this is not the place to go.  If you want a vibrant bar scene, it is.

data.title: Great Margaritas
data.text: This was a great restaurant on the second level with outside seating so you overlooked Sutter St and all the activity on the street.  We got a pitcher of margaritas and chips and salsa with a side order of guacamole.  The service was great and the portion sizes were awesome.  I highly recommend it!

data.title: Best Folsom Mexican Food and Bar in the area
data.text: Love this place.  Big or small group - you'll have fun, eat great food, and have awesome drinks.  Patio dining on the "not so hot days" is awesome. Welcome back from the fire restorations.
